text: The table below sets forth certain information relating to the installed capacity, actual production and capacity utilisation of our manufacturing facilities for the years indicated:

*As certified by Rajul Garg, independent chartered engineer, by certificate dated September 29, 2025.

(1) Installed capacity represents the installed capacity as of the last date of the relevant Fiscal. The installed capacity is based on various assumptions and estimates, including standard capacity calculation practice in the industry in which we operate and the capacity of other ancillary equipment installed at the relevant manufacturing facility. Installed capacity is calculated by multiplying the average number of machines in operation by the maximum hourly output of each machine, then by 28 working days per month and by 12 months per year.
(2) Actual production represents quantum of production in the relevant Fiscal.
(3) Capacity utilization has been calculated on the basis of actual production in the relevant Fiscal divided by the available capacity during such Fiscal.
(4) Power cables include 11KV, 33 KV, 66 KV, 132 KV and 220 KV cables.
